title: App crashes immediately post login

labels.name: priority 0: blocker
labels.description: an issues that requires immediate attention and that causes the app to not work at all (e.g a crash)

body:
# Bug Report

## Description

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33099791/207580660-8322ba2f-77ad-479b-836b-9e3e22c675b4.mp4

stacktrace:
```

/home/jenkins/workspace/status-desktop/platforms/linux/src/app/modules/main/module.nim(829) contactsStatusUpdated

SIGSEGV: Illegal storage access. (Attempt to read from nil?)
```

## Steps to reproduce

Don't really know if its enough but what I did is:

- spectated (but not joined) old community
- fetched general channel history few times
- restarted the app

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: v0.8.1-2356ac
- Operating System: Ubuntu 22.04
